segments.text: Next to the boy, a girl stands on the floor, facing him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly involved in this cookie operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her arm is raised, palm open, signaling her anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be patiently waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her posture is attentive and expectant, a true accomplice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She isn't touching the wobbly stool, which is a smart move.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel her excitement for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sweet to see the collaboration between the siblings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I am still worried about the boy on the tipping stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are both quite daring, especially with the woman so close.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope their little plan doesn't end with a crash.
segments.speaker: PAR
